item.title: Add ‘stroke-linejoin’ property for lines
item.description: Currently corners are rendered as miter joins. This is usually not an issue for roads where curves have a lot of points, but can look very bad for paths that usually aren't that detailed. Adding a ‘stroke-linejoin’ property for lines would allow a much nicer rendering.
